column1: Namlea Airport (Indonesian: Bandar Udara Namlea) (IATA: NAM
column2: ICAO: WAPR) is an airport close to the city of Namlea on the Buru island
column3: which is one of the Maluku Islands in Indonesia. There are regular scheduled flights by Aviastar to Ambon from this airport. The airport resides at an elevation of 12 m (41 ft) above mean sea level. It has one runway with dirt surface measuring 750 m (2
column4: 461 ft) in length. The Airport is operated and managed by Government. Address: Unnamed Road Namlea
